did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: RTW Duke Camp 583 Sons of Confederate Veterans Applications, 1917-1926
did.origination: RTW Duke Camp Sons of Confederate Veterans.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: RTW Duke Camp 583 Sons of Confederate Veterans Applications, MS 420, Albemarle Charlottesville Historical Society, Charlottesville, Virginia

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The RTW Duke Camp of the Sons of Confederate Veterans was organized 18 April 1893 in Charlottesville, Virginia. It was named for Colonel RTW Duke, Sr.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of applications for the RTW Duke Camp of the Sons of Confederate Veterans.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in 70 folders.
Folders 1-50 are complete applications forms for members, organized alphabetically by applicant's surname. The applicant's Civil War ancestor, if known, is listed in parenthesis.
Folders 51-70 are application receipts divided into folders alphabetically.
